Necross:
 
"Ah, I see them now.  Let's go pay them a visit."
Necross decended through the clouds, his arms crossed over his chest.  He continued to decend, until he could see Splattercannon, Nightstrike, and the two Maximals.  He devilishly grinned, and waited for them to enter his attack range.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightMare:

"My radar are picking the signal of two maximals arriving"replied 
the Femme"If we like to take all Maximals out we can strike those... 
when they are in the area"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Necross:
> "What two Maximals?  Are there some in particular you wish to 
kill?"
> He had no idea what the femme was talking about, but what ever 
made 
> the job go faster.
> 
>

observed

> > Nightstrike, he didn't like waiting for enemies to catch on to 
him.
> > > "NightStrike, let's try to draw the Maximals out.  We can see 
how 
> > they fight and find ways to smash them."
> > >  
> > > "Don't threaten me," Necross said, staring down at the 
> challenging

Unicron 
> > sent us to deal with the Maximals, not each other.  Save your 
idle
